title: My Lonely Shifter Match
description: Four best friend and ex-special forces shifters contact the Love Bites Dating Agency, each for different reasons. One for love, one to forget, one on a dare, and one by mistake. This is Cliff’s story, the one looking for love.Cliff Ridge is fresh out of the military and looking to start the next chapter in his life. He’s already built the perfect cabin in the woods, right next to his three best friends. Now he just needs to find his fated mate and start to fill all of those bedrooms with cubs.There’s just one problem.He’s been all over the world while he was in the military and has never once caught her scent.He’s growing desperate and that’s when he hears about the Love Bites Dating Agency. An arranged marriage agency specifically for shifters searching for their fated mate.One drunken night, he decides to sign up. I mean, what does he have to lose? Besides his heart.When the agency contacts him with his match, he’s shocked that they were able to find her so fast and a little hesitant to get his hopes up. One look at Honey's curvy little body though and he knows that she’s it. She’s his fated mate.This alpha shifter isn’t going to be lonely anymore. Not if he has his way about it.
author: Skye Alder
